title: Jenny is a good thing (TEFC)
creator_credit: Joan Horvath and United States. Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare
brief_description: Documentary on the food and nutrition-related activities which are part of the Head Start program for disadvantaged children in the United States. Children are shown learning about food and its preparation by actively involving themselves in tasks to do with food. Narrated by Burt Lancaster.
creator_credit_for_label: Joan Horvath and United States. Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare
